Hi Patrick,

No, our server does not block ManageWP. We used to use it on hundreds of sites before moving away from it.

I'll let you speak with Patrick, but please loop me in if you need further help.

Hi Michael,

Can we have a quick call about this when you are free?

---- On Tue, 26 Nov 2024 13:01:22 +1100 Michael Sifonios <michael@etchstudio.com.au> wrote ---

Hi Heath

I've noticed that the heartsmart website is now experiencing issues connecting to ManageWP (using the WP worker plugin).
It was working at launch. Is this something your server is potentially blocking?

I utilise ManageWP to optimise Performance, measure SEO, produce client reports and other tasks.

Kind Regards

Michael Sifonios
Designer / Developer

Hi Michael,

Thanks for adding us. Confirming we have:

  1. Deleted LearnDash via SFTP.
  2. Fixed the tables for Yoast SEO, and checked. It's working fine at our end, please check and confirm.
  3. Ran the available plugin updates (except 'Ninja Forms - Layout & Styles', as the licence has not been added yet).

Can you please add the licences for the Ninja Forms add ons here: https://beheartsmart.com.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=nf-settings&tab=licenses as these will need to be updated in time.

Let me know how you go and if you need anything else?

Hi Heath, while you're having a look - I also noticed an existing plugin from the previous website was not removed during the migration - 'LearnDash LMS'.
When I try to delete the plugin it gives me the error 'Deletion failed: There has been a critical error on this website.'
Can you manually delete this plugin through your backend access as this may be causing an issue.

Thanks

Kind Regards

Michael Sifonios
Designer / Developer
